articles.author: Sabrina Malhi
articles.title: Americans expect to lose trust in public health under new leadership - The Washington Post
articles.description: A new poll shows that trust on public health issues is expected to erode, though there is a partisan divide.
articles.content: Leadership changes at federal health agencies are eroding trust in public health recommendations, with more Americans expecting to lose confidence than gain it, according to a poll released Tuesday b… [+5706 chars]

articles.title: CNN Poll: Frustrated Americans want more checks on Trump, have dim views of Democratic opposition - CNN
